name: Baked Pasta & Italian Meatballs
description: Easy, hearty, and kid-friendly, even the pickiest eaters won’t be able to resist this baked pasta with classic, herby Italian flavours. Prep the pasta and meatballs ahead of time, and then just pop it in the oven for an easy, weeknight win. Pro tip: Epicure’s Multipurpose Steamer can be your cooking pot, your mixing bowl, your storage container, and your casserole dish (it’s oven-safe!)—multipurpose, indeed!

ingredients.name: lean ground beef or a combination of beef and pork
Marinara Sauce Mix or Pizza Seasoning
lean ground beef, chicken or turkey

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, cook macaroni according to package directions.
In Multipurpose Pot, heat Marinara Sauce over medium-low heat. Once sauce is simmering, add meatballs, stir, and heat for approximately 5 minutes.
Drain macaroni, return to pot, and mix in Marinara Sauce and meatballs. Pour into a 3 quart oven-safe casserole dish. Top with coating mix, if using, and Parmesan.
Bake until top is golden brown, approximately 20 minutes.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: An all-purpose blend with mild heat & aromatic flavour.

products.name: Pizza Seasoning (1002291)
summary: In a world of complex gastronomy, pizza is a testament to the simple pleasures we all crave. Now you can get it by the spoonful! This blend delivers the nostalgic flavours and feeling of eating pizza, with notes of basil, oregano, garlic, tomato, and green bell peppers with loads of Parmesan. And yes, there is a mild whisper of chilli, too!
